title: 聯機時如果用Mod ?？
author: winghang
txt_content: 請問有人可以教我聯機用ｍｏｄ，要怎在ｓｅｖｅｒ裝ｍｏｄ?

replies.author: winghang
replies.txt_content: MCPC是那種，但入面好像沒mod file ? ?

replies.author: linnaea
replies.txt_content:
1.6.4/1.7.2/1.7.10的话，去http://files.minecraftforge.net/Cauldron/下Installer安装Cauldron服务端

更早的版本不太好找

replies.author: winghang
replies.txt_content: 先謝了，試試看，不懂再問
